original_text: The priests chose one of their group to go into the holy place in the temple. This time they chose Zechariah. His job was to burn incense there.
korean_text: 제사장의 전례를 따라 제비를 뽑아 주의 성전에 들어가 분향하고

sentences.original_text: The priests chose one of their group
sentences.korean_translation: 제사장들은 그들 그룹 중에서 한 명을 선택했습니다

sentences.original_text: to go into the holy place in the temple
His job was to burn incense there
sentences.korean_translation: 그의 직책은 그곳에서 향을 피우는 것이었습니다
